Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates Joe Biden's statement by falsely attributing the quote "Antifa are courageous Americans" to him.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that Joe Biden made the statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Joe Biden specifically singled out Antifa as "courageous Americans," when in fact he was referring to a broader group of people who opposed white nationalist demonstrators.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Joe Biden did not make the statement attributed to him.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided that Joe Biden's statement was in reference to the counter-protesters at the Charlottesville rallies, which included Antifa but also other groups.
